features: 【 Luxury Design 】 The shag geometric rug is made of three-layer material: No-shedding shu cotton fleece on the top, increases softness and comfort. Memory foam in the middle, increase the thickness and keep away from the cold floor, and non-slip design on the back makes the carpet hard to move on the floor.
【 Unique Style 】 The three-dimensional lantern pattern design of the modern area rug increases the fashion sense, makes the product more advanced and more comfortable when touch the rug.

【 Fashion Room Decor 】 The grey and white rug is perfect for simple style, brings comfortable and warmth, and suitable for living room, bedroom, bedside, playroom, dorm and more indoor space. It will be a nice gift to give warmth and love to your friends and family.
【 Tips for Using Carpet 】 The fluffy area rug adopts vacuum packed, when you receive the package, there may be creases, Please lay it flat or roll it up for 2- 3 days. The carpet will be flat.

【 Clean Tips 】 The room rug are designed with short faux fur. Don't worry about the hair falling off or not fluffy after cleaning. Daily cleaning with vacuum cleaner is enough. For overall cleaning, you can use machine wash, but it is not recommended to wash too frequently, because machine wash is always too violent for the soft carpets. If you want to use it longer, you'd better clean it by hand.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: what's the material of this area rug ? The surface of this carpet is made of shu cotton fleece, and there is a memory foam in the middle of the room rug to increase the thickness of the carpet. What size of the rug should I choose ? it makes me so torn. For bedroom, you can choose according to the length of bed you need to place. For living room, according to the length of the sofa, it is recommended to choose a larger size, you can use the sofa or bed to press the edge. Where can this carpet be used ? The modren rug can be used in bedroom, livng room, kids room,play room and more indoor space Can this be vacuumed? Yes,the bedroom rug is adopted cottom pile, I've cleaned with low power vacuum several times already without any change in rug texture.
Chicrug Shag Geometric Modern Area Rug for Bedroom, Memory Foam Indoor Carpet, Moroccan Fluffy Rug for Living room Bedside Room Decor for Family Girls Kids Nursery Play Mat

Size for you to choose : 2x6 feet/ 3x5 feet / 4x6 feet / 5x7 feet/ 6x9 feet/7x10 feet Choose the right size according to the size of the space to be used. The Geometric rug is suitable for bedroom , living room, class room ,Study Room ,dorm room , kids room and more indoor space you want .

The comfortable pile surface adds softness and comfort to the carpet, insulating the feet from the cold floor. Lantern pattern design increases the fashion sense of the carpet, bring more warmth and comfort. We use the latest technology, the gap between the fleece surface to achieve the minimum, make it not easy to fall off.

The patterned shape of the rubber back increases the fit between the carpet and the floor, making the carpet not slide . The short pile silk increases the comfort of the carpet and makes cleaning easier.
BRIGHT YOUR ROOM, WARM YOUR HEART !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! So impressed!
reviews.reviewText: I had doubts about this purchase, the price was really a sweet deal, and it seemed too good to be true.It was not to good to be true!!!!The cryovac shipping package was easy to open, it was placed out flat for the afternoon, and the rug expanded and spread evenly by evening time.It's not only pretty, but it feels heavenly! Cushy and soft, and so nice under bare feet.It looks like it might collect dirt and stuff, so it might need frequent cleaning, but I'm in love with this rug!So worth it!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this rug I really like the pattern and it is really soft to I have purchased two of these and they are great easy to vacuum and keep clean I definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not great, but ok
reviews.reviewText: The rug is soft and the colors are vibrant. I have not washed it yet, so hopefully that stays the same. I have it on tile and I would say the "non-slip" aspect needs to be improved upon. Part of the issue it is so lightweight that it moves too easily. It is priced well and as they say, you get what you pay for. I am using this in my laundry room and it fits my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Different way of packaging a rug.
reviews.reviewText: The rug came in a box that was approximately two feet by two feet. It was a 9 foot by seven-foot rug. When I opened the box, I discovered that the rug was shrink wrapped. When it was rolled out it was very wrinkled.Initially, I was not satisfied with the way it looked. However, the instructions stated that it would flatten out in 48 hours. I was very skeptical that anything would change. However, much to my surprise the rug did indeed flatten out. The rug looks great! I would buy another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought a few of these rugs to put on my tile floor when my baby started crawling. They are soft and have a little bit of cushion with rubber on the underside to keep it from sliding. It has a synthetic smell when you first open it. I drape then over my banister to let them air out a bit before putting them down on the floor. It’s all folded up and shrink wrapped when you get it but let it air out with the rug completely unfolded and all the bumps and wrinkles quickly come out. The rugs vary even though I got 3 of the same. Which is fine since they will only be down temporarily and are not for long term. The piling on the 3x5 size rug looks good and has a better, thicker quality about it, but the 4x6 rug’s piling is significantly thinner and looks cheaply made and has that synthetic look about it. There’s also an obvious color variation between the 4x6 and the 3x5 sized rugs even though I bought all the same color gray. Attached photo shows the variation in color and piling. I do need more rugs as my baby starts crawling further around the house, I’ll just stick with the 3x5’s since they seem to be more well made for the price. I wouldn’t keep these around long term, they are not durable enough to last long term.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Rug & Great Price!
reviews.reviewText: I was very pleased with the quality of the rug whenever I took it out of the packaging. It was also a great price for the quality and sizes you can choose from. It’s very soft, thick, and comfortable to stand on. I purchased this rug for my bedroom, to put it along side of the bed. Our whole bedroom flooring is hard wood. So I wanted something soft to stand on whenever I got out of bed. Also, that my dogs could lay down on it and it would be soft and a little plush for them as well. I LOVE the fact that if it gets dirty, I can just put it in the washer easily to clean it. It’s very light in weight to put in you washing machine. You just have to air dry it or put ur heat setting low so it doesn’t ruin it. I definitely would recommend this rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So So So Soft!
reviews.reviewText: Every time I step foot on this rug, it brings a smile to my face. It’s just so soft and comforting under your toes. My only complaint is you needmore pattern/color options so I can buy more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First this is not a shag rug as title says. Second it’s so thin I needed a pad under it otherwise you feel like your stop walking on floor. The size is good. This is second right I bought off Amazon and they never tell you they are barely thicker than paper. Don’t waste your money unless you buy a very thick pad to go with it. I knew as soon as I seen such a small package and then opened it and it was possible to shrink wrap a 4x6 “shag” rug that it has to be very thin. It’s like walking on a cheap towel
